content:
The Lobster at Santa Monica Pier is a popular spot for seafood lovers, but they also cater to vegetarian and vegan visitors.

While their menu is primarily focused on seafood, they do offer some vegetarian and vegan options. Here are a few dishes you might enjoy:

**Vegetarian Options:**

1. **Grilled Portobello Mushroom Burger**: A flavorful mushroom patty topped with avocado, lettuce, and tomato on a brioche bun. ($18)
2. **Roasted Vegetable Salad**: A fresh mix of roasted vegetables, quinoa, and mixed greens, topped with a citrus vinaigrette. ($16)
3. **Vegetable Skewers**: Grilled skewers of marinated vegetables, served with a side of quinoa and tzatziki sauce. ($18)

**Vegan Options:**

1. **Vegan "Fish" Tacos**: Crispy corn tortillas filled with battered and fried tofu, topped with shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, and a tangy slaw made with vegan mayo. ($18)
2. **Quinoa Bowl**: A hearty bowl filled with roasted vegetables, quinoa, and a citrus-herb vinaigrette. (Can be modified to be vegan by asking for no cheese or dairy) ($16)

Please note that while these options are vegetarian or vegan, they may still contain gluten or other allergens. It's always a good idea to inform your server of any dietary restrictions or preferences, and they'll do their best to accommodate you.

If you have any other questions or concerns, you can always call The Lobster directly or check their website for more information. Enjoy your meal!
